content: Hello, would you be interested in solar panels for your business? We have great offers this month! Reply YES to learn more.
Thank you for reaching out to XYZ Home Services. We provide plumbing, electrical, and HVAC services. How may I assist you with any home service needs today?
Get your business ranking #1 on Google! Our SEO packages guarantee results. Reply PROMO for more info.
This chat is reserved for customers seeking plumbing, electrical, or HVAC services. If you require assistance with one of those, please let me know!
WIN a free iPhone just for responding! Click here: bit.ly/xyz-win FREE entry!
Your messages appear to be unrelated to our home services. We are unable to process requests that are not for plumbing, electrical, or HVAC needs. Thank you.
reason: Customer sent repeated unsolicited promotional messages.
